example_prompts.intro: Generate a professional introduction message for {contact_name} who is a {role} at {company}. Context: {context}
example_prompts.follow_up: Generate a follow-up message for {contact_name}. Previous interaction: {last_message}
example_prompts.meeting: Generate a meeting request message for {contact_name} at {company}
example_prompts.policy_brief: Generate a policy briefing message for {contact_name} regarding {policy_topic}
example_prompts.coalition_invite: Generate an invitation to join a coalition or working group for {contact_name}

example_message.content: Dear Senator Martinez, I hope this message finds you well. As Chair of the Technology Subcommittee, your leadership on AI regulation and digital privacy has been exemplary. I wanted to reach out regarding our new civic engagement platform that could support your committee's oversight efforts...

additional_examples.content: Hi David, Following up on our conversation about digital organizing tools. I wanted to share some insights on how our voter outreach technology has helped similar grassroots campaigns increase engagement by 40%...
Councilwoman Santos, I'd love to schedule a brief meeting to discuss how our smart city solutions could support Metro City's digital transformation initiatives. Would you have 20 minutes next week?

note: Politics-focused sample data for outreach campaigns targeting government officials, policy makers, and civic organizations.
